short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sisters of Another Land: By Shyama Kuver

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This piece is of two femme-presenting profiles facing one another atop two hands reaching towards a starlit sky. This piece explores trust in our shared connection with one another—across time, space, and difference.

Shyama Kuver’s artistic practice is inspired by her queer and Indo-Fijian identities, a deep love for nature, and growing up in pre-tech San Francisco. She is a community and self-taught artist living in Washington, D.C. During the day, she works in education, creating access and equitable infrastructures for students who are parenting, system-impacted, and/or are returning to pursue their undergraduate degree as adults. At night, she likes to explore new and old worlds through her artistic practice.
